parsing_result:
# IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Movie Recording)

## DYNAMIC RANGE
Choose a dynamic range for movie recording.

| Option  | Description                              |
|---------|------------------------------------------|
| 100%    | See “DYNAMIC RANGE” (page 134).          |
| 200%    |                                          |
| 400%    |                                          |

- **AUTO** (automatic dynamic range control) is not available during movie recording.
  - **200%** is available at sensitivities from ISO 200 to ISO 12800.
  - **400%** at sensitivities from ISO 400 to 12800.
  - This item is available when specific settings are selected for **MOVIE SETTING > F-Log/HLG RECORDING**.

## WHITE BALANCE
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (page 136).

## TONE CURVE
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (page 140).

## COLOR
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (page 140).
